fa-list/bordered.description: Toggles rendering of the border around the list

fa-list/grid.description: The grid type of list. You can set grid to something like {gutter: 16, column: 4}

fa-list/itemLayout.description: The layout of list, default is horizontal, If a vertical list is desired, set the itemLayout property to vertical

fa-list/loading.description: Shows a loading indicator while the contents of the list are being fetched

fa-list/pagination.description: Pagination config, hide it by setting it to false

fa-list/split.description: Toggles rendering of the split under the list item

fa-list/renderItem.description: Custom item renderer, slot="renderItem" and slot-scope="item, index"

fa-list/rowKey.description: Specify the key that will be used for uniquely identify each element
